price: Ambao watairithi Pepo ya Firdausi, wadumu humo.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: Hawa ndio Mwenyezi Mungu atawafadhili kwa kuwapa Firdausi, ndio pahala pa juu kabisa huko Peponi, wastarehe humo peke yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
